column4: I'm using Natty on an HP with a Mobility Radeon X1300. When trying to run glxgears(or bzflag, etc) I get an error saying that extension GLX is missing.
I would love some help getting GLX working
you need a driver for your card - i'm not sure the open source driver will have 3d (right now you aren't getting 3d - that's what GLX is BTW)
yeah, I know that part. I'm trying to figure out what drivers I need
